Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails. Review the current progress on promotional graphics and game trailer assets.
Sketch initial concepts for key art and social media content. Focus on capturing the game's tone and style.
Break. Browse art inspiration websites like ArtStation or Behance.
Refine sketches and select the strongest concepts for further development.
Begin digital painting for the key art, focusing on composition and color palette.
Review progress with @uiux-1 and @prod-1 for feedback on the key art direction.
Adjust key art based on feedback and finalize the rough draft.
